steps.hint: Guaranteed Level Up to Level 2
steps.layoutTip: Walk East/North-East along the coastline. Hillock is always at the far East end. Ignore all enemies - only grab weapon, skill gem, and support gem.

steps.hint: No need to kill enemies - next zones will suffice to reach Level 4. Click corpses for loot.
The streams form a triangle or line pattern
steps.layoutTip: All 3 nests are in a triangle pattern. The zone has three major layout variants: East, North, and South. Look for quest markers and the exit in the general direction of the variant.

steps.description: Kill Hailrake and collect Medicine Chest
steps.hint: Recommended Level 4
steps.layoutTip: Go left. If you face a ledge, turn around and take the right/east side to get to Hailrake.

steps.description: Turn in quests to Tarkleigh and Nessa
Find the bridge and place Portal
steps.hint: Or place portal when you see Flooded Depths entrance on minimap
steps.layoutTip: Follow the zone. Place portal at the bridge, or when you see the Flooded Depths entrance on minimap, place portal then look for the bridge.

steps.description: Cross bridge to enter The Ledge
Follow the wall to The Climb
steps.hint: Safer route: follow the cliff. Avoid Kuduku the False God (totem boss with AoE explosion)
steps.layoutTip: Stick to the mountain side wall until you get out of the goat passage, then stick to the water side wall to avoid the AoE explosion of Kuduku the False God.

steps.description: Follow the west edge to Lower Prison
steps.hint: Follow the west edge from the entrance

steps.description: Take Portal back to Submerged Passage
steps.optionalNote: [LEAGUE START] Skip if not league start - buy gems from Lilly Roth instead

steps.hint: Usually at 6 o'clock or 1 o'clock before bridge, rarely 3 o'clock
Search diagonally opposite the entrance

steps.description: Talk to Tarkleigh for Passive Point

steps.hint: Usually at 1 o'clock in the zone
High chance for Quicksilver Flask. Vendor: QSF + Aug + Boots = MS Boots
steps.layoutTip: Check north-east first, if dead end, turn around. Then follow the outer wall. This read is not guaranteed to find the strongbox or be the fastest, but it will lead to the exit.

steps.hint: Aim to be Level 8-10

steps.description: Follow ledge near road to side passage, then to Ship Graveyard
steps.hint: Exit is always on a lower layer than entrance - follow downward slopes
steps.layoutTip: The exit is always on a lower layer than the entrance. The correct path has several slopes/ledges down. One side of the zone is a massive mountain wall - find the ledge side, then follow the downward slopes.

steps.description: Find Ship Graveyard Cave entrance and place Portal
steps.layoutTip: Follow the cliff side until you see the Ship Graveyard Cave entrance or the Cavern of Wrath entrance. If you see the cave first, place a portal near it and search for Cavern of Wrath. If you find Cavern of Wrath first, enter, get WP, exit and search for cave.

steps.description: Find and enter Cavern of Wrath

steps.hint: Follow the river in the direction the water flows
Search diagonally opposite the entrance
steps.layoutTip: The Allflame and exit to Fairgraves arena are always in a diagonal line to the entrance. The pathing through the cave system is a bit more zig zag, but keep the diagonal line in mind and determine which direction the zone extends to.

steps.description: Talk to Bestel for Passive Point
Get remaining Act 1 gems from Nessa
steps.hint: Or revisit during Act 2

steps.description: Follow water to Cavern of Anger
steps.hint: Follow the water in the direction it flows

steps.description: Kill Merveil (Act 1 Final Boss) → Enter The Southern Forest (Act 2)
steps.hint: Follow the water to Merveil's Lair. Aim to be Level 11.5-12

steps.description: Follow the edge path to The Forest Encampment
steps.hint: High-density zone - great for experience catch-up if underleveled
steps.layoutTip: Follow the zone edge to reach town. Kill enemy packs for quick experience gains as this zone has excellent density.

steps.description: Place Portal at The Den entrance
steps.hint: Only needed if getting 2nd Quicksilver Flask
steps.layoutTip: Follow the road to locate The Den entrance. Place portal here if doing the optional Quicksilver Flask quest.

steps.hint: The road leads directly to the zone exit
Static layout - Waypoint is always at center

steps.description: Waypoint to Town or take Portal to complete Den quest
steps.hint: Kill White Beast, then talk to Yeena for reward

steps.description: Head to Chamber of Sins Level 1
steps.hint: Exit is roughly northwest from the Waypoint
Find the circular inner room - exit is behind Waypoint
steps.layoutTip: Find the entrance to the central circular chamber. The Waypoint is always next to the passage leading to Level 2. Head to the passage behind the Waypoint to proceed.

steps.hint: Waypoint icon on minimap points toward the exit
steps.layoutTip: Navigate to the central room. Use the Waypoint icon on your minimap as a guide - it points toward the exit direction.

steps.description: Kill Fidelitas and collect Baleful Gem
steps.hint: Located in a long corridor. Aim for Level 14-15
steps.layoutTip: Find the long corridor extending from the central room. Fidelitas awaits at the end.

steps.description: Talk to Greust → Waypoint to Riverways
Activate Waypoint → Follow road to Western Forest
steps.hint: Follow the road to find it. Broken bridges require movement skills.
Follow the road to locate it
Opposite side of road from Waypoint
steps.layoutTip: The entrance to Weaver's Chambers is on the opposite side of the road from the Waypoint. Alira's camp is on the same side as the entrance, accessible via a small rocky path.

steps.description: Kill The Weaver and collect Maligaro's Spike
steps.hint: Head northwest from entrance. If blocked, go north
steps.layoutTip: From the entrance, follow the left wall. Head northwest - if you hit a dead end, redirect north.

steps.description: Talk to Silk → Waypoint to Crossroads

steps.hint: Exit is roughly north from center

steps.description: Find hidden chest with 3 Rogue Exiles
steps.hint: Follow road to Waypoint, look for ruins nearby
steps.layoutTip: Follow the road to the Waypoint. Search nearby for ruins containing a chest guarded by 3 Rogue Exiles.

steps.description: Kill Kraityn and collect his Amulet
steps.hint: Follow the road to find Kraityn's camp

steps.description: Find trail between two pillars to Wetlands
steps.hint: Look for the distinctive two-pillar entrance
steps.layoutTip: Search for a trail marked by two standing pillars. This is the entrance to The Wetlands.

steps.description: Kill Oak and collect his Amulet
steps.hint: Look for the arena structure - only large building in zone
steps.layoutTip: Oak's camp features a distinctive arena structure - the only large building in the zone. Usually located north or northwest, rarely southeast. Look for zigzag edges on the minimap.

steps.hint: Head southwest on road to torch, then follow side path
steps.layoutTip: Follow the main road to a torch marker. From there, take the small rocky side path to reach Alira's camp. If helping Alira, collect The Apex afterward.

steps.description: Kill Arteri and collect Thaumetic Emblem
steps.hint: Continue along main road to Blackguard camp

steps.description: Use Thaumetic Emblem on Seal and collect Baleful Gem or relog to town
steps.hint: Unlocks passage to Vaal Ruins

steps.description: Talk to Eramir (if killed all bandits)
steps.hint: Skip if you helped a bandit

steps.description: Talk to Bestel for Passive Point
Get remaining Act 1 gems from Nessa
steps.hint: If not collected earlier
Exit is roughly east from center
Kill insect packs to maintain flask and frenzy charges
steps.layoutTip: Follow the main road through the zone. Kill small insect groups along the way to keep your Quicksilver Flask and Frenzy Charges active.

steps.hint: Same path leads to both Trial and Level 2
steps.layoutTip: Draw a horizontal line through the starting room. If the Waypoint is below, follow the wall opposite the Waypoint. If above, follow the wall behind it. This leads to both the Trial and Crypt Level 2.

steps.description: Find altar and collect Golden Hand
steps.hint: Search diagonally opposite the entrance
steps.layoutTip: The altar with the Golden Hand is typically found diagonally opposite from the entrance.

steps.hint: Portal recommended - Relog sends to Act 1

steps.description: Use Baleful Gem to poison the tree roots at Vaal Ruins entrance
steps.hint: Entrance to Vaal Ruins is near waypoint

steps.description: Navigate through Vaal Ruins and enter The Northern Forest
steps.hint: S-shaped or L-shaped zone. Walk forward until hitting dead end, then turn
Follow waterside eastern edge heading north. Rituals offer great experience.
Locked door with 2 pillar switches
steps.layoutTip: Search for a locked door with two small pillar switches nearby. Activate both to open the secret door.

steps.hint: Search the corners of the zone
1st stairs in random corner, 2nd diagonally opposite
steps.layoutTip: Outside the first floor, each staircase to the next level is always diagonally opposite from where you entered. The first stairs are in a random corner.

steps.description: Kill Vaal Oversoul (Act 2 Final Boss) → Enter The City of Sarn (Act 3)
steps.hint: Aim for Level 20-22

subtasks.hint: Recommend portal/relog to sell items first

steps.hint: Clarissa is at a pillar near the first staircase to the Docks area
steps.layoutTip: Clear all Blackguard members near Clarissa for her to stand up and become interactable. She's always positioned near a pillar adjacent to the first staircase.

steps.description: Follow edge path to The Sarn Encampment
steps.hint: Follow the 5 o'clock edge
Search diagonally opposite from entrance
steps.layoutTip: Move away from the dead-end at zone start. The Crematorium entrance is typically found diagonally opposite from where you entered the Slums.

steps.hint: Visible in fog while still undiscovered
Boss location visible in fog

steps.description: Talk to Clarissa for Sewer Keys

steps.hint: 2nd bust location indicates 3rd bust direction
steps.layoutTip: After big room with WP: if 2nd bust is found in a large room, the 3rd bust is at 12 o'clock from exit. Otherwise, it's at 2 o'clock. In small room layout after WP, the 3rd bust is south.

steps.hint: Zone extends based on water location
steps.layoutTip: If water is west of entrance, zone extends north. Otherwise, zone extends west. Search for the arch to find the waypoint. From waypoint, follow the east wall to find The Battlefront.

steps.hint: Located nearby waypoint
Move east from starting room if possible, north otherwise
steps.layoutTip: After entering, prioritize moving east. If blocked, head north instead. This pathing leads efficiently to the trial.

steps.hint: Often found parallel to arena entrance wall

steps.description: Talk to Hargan for Passive Point
steps.hint: Check vendors for 4-link items if Level 23+
Usually 1 or 12 o'clock, rarely 5 o'clock
Waypoint is on first elevation layer

steps.description: Head 5 o'clock to collect Ribbon Spool
Enter Solaris Temple Level 1 (if not Level 23½)
steps.hint: Head 1 o'clock to entrance. If already Level 23½+, skip to Docks
Walk forward until wall, turn toward zone extension
steps.layoutTip: Move forward until hitting a wall. Check if zone extends further in that direction. If yes, move around the wall and continue forward. If not, turn toward the zone extension and proceed.

steps.hint: Near waypoint in Eternal Laboratory arena
North of waypoint, at end of river
Excellent zone for XP farming
steps.layoutTip: You spawn near a corner. Follow the opposite direction along the wall until you locate the Thaumetic Sulphite.

steps.hint: Follow red carpet

steps.description: Talk to Dialla again for Infernal Talc
Use Infernal Talc on Undying Blockage

steps.layoutTip: Zone is semi-static. Head north-east to find waypoint. Only variation is whether Gravicius and exit are in line or exit faces east.

steps.description: Head 7 o'clock to kill General Gravicius
steps.hint: Rewards Level 28 Skill Gems

steps.description: Head 7 o'clock to Lunaris Temple Level 1

steps.hint: Follow red carpet
Follow stairs going up, then single wagon at fork
steps.layoutTip: Choose paths with stairs going up. At the fork with wagons, take the path with a single wagon. Stay consistent with movement pattern (clockwise or counter-clockwise).

steps.description: Talk to Grigor for Passive Point
Visit Hideout or buy gems from Lilly Roth
steps.hint: Check for off-class support gems

steps.description: Head 1 o'clock to The Imperial Gardens

steps.layoutTip: Follow the main road through the zone. The waypoint is along this path.

steps.description: Head 12 o'clock off-road for Trial of Ascendancy
steps.hint: North corner, off the main road
steps.layoutTip: From waypoint, head to the north corner away from the road to find the trial.

steps.hint: For Level 31 and off-class support gems

steps.description: Find loose candle and enter The Archives

steps.hint: Hidden crafting bench: candle in narrow corridor
steps.layoutTip: Traverse the zone in a clockwise pattern to efficiently collect all pages.

steps.hint: Prepare for gem purchases
Build-dependent. Another reminder follows later
steps.layoutTip: Waypoint to town, enter Aspirants' Plaza from town.

steps.description: Follow wagons to Sceptre of God
steps.hint: Follow the road with wagons

steps.description: Navigate to Upper Sceptre of God
steps.hint: Floors are circular - arena stairs spawn every 90°
steps.layoutTip: Traverse clockwise while staying in the inner square. Move in the direction stairs place you. If no door in that direction, check the opposite side first.

steps.description: Find and enter Tower Rooftop arena
steps.hint: Same layout rules - head 1 o'clock after Scion cage
steps.layoutTip: Follow same navigation rules as Sceptre of God. After passing the Scion cage, head toward 1 o'clock to reach the rooftop.

steps.hint: Run through without killing - save time for later zones
steps.layoutTip: Dead ends to the west or east have blue monster packs. If a walkway ends, there's always a bridge crossing over the water to the other side.

steps.description: Kill Voll and collect Deshret's Banner
steps.hint: Look for the book icon on minimap - it appears before the arena
steps.layoutTip: The first thing you'll see of Voll's arena is the book icon on the minimap 90% of the time. Once you spot the icon, move directly toward it.

steps.hint: Move northwest when possible, otherwise follow the zone
Look for the glowing spirit as you progress through
steps.layoutTip: The layout determines the path. If the zone extends south, follow it until you see Deshret's Spirit, free him, then continue forward.

steps.hint: Aim to reach Level 31 by this point
steps.layoutTip: Stick to the opposite edge of whichever direction the first passage takes. This leads to both the waypoint and the zone exits.

steps.description: Talk to Tasuni for Passive Point

steps.hint: To complete Normal Labyrinth if not done yet
Enter Aspirants' Plaza from Act 3 Town
Prioritize moving east, then south to reach east, then north
steps.layoutTip: If you can move east, do so. Otherwise move south until you can go east again. When you hit the east edge, move north to the exit.

steps.description: Kill Daresso and collect Eye of Desire
steps.hint: Follow corridors. At splits, take north or west options
steps.layoutTip: The zone consists of arenas connected by corridors. Follow straight paths without splits. In arenas, cross directly to find the next corridor. When paths split, take the north or northwest option.

steps.hint: Portal places you right next to waypoint
Head 1 o'clock, then follow bridges to the exit
steps.layoutTip: Start by heading toward 1 o'clock. Then follow the bridges that connect across the zone until you reach the exit.

steps.description: Kill Kaom and collect Eye of Fury
steps.hint: Enter Caldera of the King arena to fight the boss
Portal places you right next to waypoint

steps.description: Enter Belly of the Beast Level 1

steps.zone: The Belly of the Beast Level 1
steps.description: Navigate to Belly of the Beast Level 2
steps.hint: Prioritize west, then north, then east. Reverse on dead ends
steps.layoutTip: Move west if possible. If not, move north. If neither works, move east. When you hit a dead end, turn around and repeat the priority order.

steps.zone: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
steps.description: Enter Bowels of the Beast and kill Piety

steps.zone: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
steps.description: Talk to Piety after defeating her

steps.zone: The Belly of the Beast Level 2
The Belly of the Beast Level 2

steps.hint: Static layout: 1 boss east, 2 bosses west of waypoint
steps.layoutTip: This zone has a static layout. One boss is always east of the waypoint, and two bosses are west. You can portal to town and re-enter from waypoint between bosses if needed to manage load times.

steps.description: Talk to Piety after killing all three
Enter The Black Core and kill Malachai
steps.hint: Final Act 4 boss - recommended Level 34-35
Move north, cross long bridge, hug east edge after encampment
steps.layoutTip: Move north. In the middle of the zone is a long bridge. After crossing, stick to the east edge until you pass the encampment with the crafting recipe. When the path curves west, follow it west to activate the lever.

steps.description: Activate Crafting Recipe → Activate portal device and enter Act 5
steps.hint: Located in the encampment midway through the zone

subtasks.description: Activate portal device and enter Act 5

steps.description: Navigate through corridor with hanged Karui
steps.hint: Follow south edge to reach the corridor
steps.layoutTip: Follow the southern edge until you reach the corridor with hanged Karui. The exit is always south of this corridor - move in a clockwise direction to reach it.

steps.hint: Located at the end of the zone near the tower entrance
Head south-west from entrance

steps.description: Kill Justicar Casticus and collect Eyes of Zeal
steps.hint: Head north from entrance - use blink skills through broken gates to skip sections
steps.layoutTip: Move north. Use any movement skill (dash/blink) at broken gates to skip through - works both going up and down slopes.

steps.hint: Head north from entrance
Move in a clockwise direction through the courts
Follow outer wall counter-clockwise - recommended level 37+
steps.layoutTip: Stick to the outer wall and move counter-clockwise. Each elevated platform contains a guaranteed rare monster pack - excellent zone to farm levels 40-42.

steps.hint: Located in a side corridor about halfway through the zone

steps.quest: The Key to Freedom & Death to Purity

steps.description: Talk to Bannon to unlock as vendor
steps.hint: This unlocks Bannon as armor and weapon vendor in town

steps.description: Waypoint to The Chamber of Innocence

steps.hint: Move counter-clockwise through the zone
Fixed layout. Head south-west from entrance
Located in a tomb area within the zone
steps.layoutTip: Navigate through the ossuary to find the tomb containing the Sign of Purity. If your load times are fast, portal/relog immediately after grabbing it. Otherwise, use the lever and exit via the entrance.

steps.hint: Head south from waypoint to reach the large central square
Move east from the square center
From the central square, move south-east
Found near the corners - choose a direction and follow the outer edge
steps.layoutTip: Pick clockwise or counter-clockwise and follow the outer edge of the zone. The three Kitava's Torment relics are positioned near the corners of the zone.

steps.description: Return to Overseer's Tower (Relog or waypoint)
steps.hint: After collecting the third relic, waypoint or die to respawn in town (softcore only)

steps.description: Talk to Bannon for weapon quest
steps.hint: Opens arena fight with Utula - only if you killed Utula earlier
Move south from the central square
Move north-east through the rooftop
Final boss of Act 5 - permanent -30% resistance penalty after death
Beginning of Part 2 - you will revisit Wraeclast
Lilly's countdown displays when 5 enemies remain
steps.layoutTip: Clear East to West to East pattern - faster than following the edge. Ensure you've discovered the full minimap.

steps.hint: Skip gems if no PoB imported

steps.layoutTip: Move in a direct line toward the direction the zone extends - ignore layout variants.

steps.description: Kill Dishonoured Queen for Eye of Conquest
steps.hint: Located at the former Submerged Passage entrance (east edge)
steps.layoutTip: Head east until you hit the edge, then move north or south to find the Submerged entrance marked by Nessa. Queen is nearby. No need to talk to Nessa.

steps.hint: From Queen, follow the north edge eastward

steps.description: Enter Tukohama's Keep and kill Tukohama
steps.layoutTip: Static layout. Move east from entrance to find Tukohama's boss arena entrance.

steps.description: Exit north from boss arena, head to The Ridge
steps.hint: After exiting Tukohama's arena, move east then north to the exit
steps.layoutTip: Exit through the north door of the boss arena, continue east, then head north to find The Ridge exit.
Follow the right wall from the entrance.

steps.description: Portal to town then waypoint to Coast (or direct portal to Coast)
steps.hint: Can portal directly to Coast or via town waypoint
steps.optionalNote: [LEAGUE START] League-start only - if Twilight Strand was cleared

steps.hint: Skip if you have a strong belt equipped
steps.optionalNote: [LEAGUE START] Only if you need belt upgrade

steps.layoutTip: Head west. If you hit a ledge, turn around and take the east side to reach the storage chest.
steps.optionalNote: [LEAGUE START] Only if you need belt upgrade
[LEAGUE START] Only if you completed Tidal Island

steps.description: Talk to Lilly for Respec Points
Talk to Bestel for Rare Belt

steps.hint: Follow right wall from waypoint to find the trial
steps.layoutTip: Follow the right wall from waypoint to locate the trial. After trial, either backtrack to Shavronne's Tower exit or continue right wall if exit not found yet.

steps.description: Reach the Prison Rooftop and kill Shavronne & Brutus
steps.layoutTip: Follow the left wall from entrance on each floor.

steps.description: Enter Abberath's Arena and kill Abberath
steps.hint: Arena is in the side area behind a ledge
steps.layoutTip: Arena entrance is located in the side zone behind the ledge, not on the main road.

steps.description: Follow the road to Western Forest
steps.hint: Stay on the main road to reach the exit

steps.description: Follow the road to The Riverways
steps.hint: Stay on the main road

steps.description: Look for Crafting Recipe on side path
steps.hint: Side path marked by a torch on the road
Follow the main road to find the waypoint

steps.description: Find trail between 2 pillars leading to Wetlands
steps.hint: Pebble path at waypoint leads to Wetlands
steps.layoutTip: At the waypoint, look for a pebble path between two pillars - this leads to The Wetlands.

steps.description: Find Spawning Grounds and kill Ryslatha
steps.hint: Head south to locate the boss arena
steps.layoutTip: Follow the left wall until you find the Spawning Grounds arena entrance.

steps.description: Follow road to blockage, head south to Southern Forest
steps.hint: At the blocked road, head south for the exit
steps.layoutTip: Continue along the road past the waypoint. When you reach the blockage, turn south to find the Southern Forest exit.

steps.hint: Great zone for experience farming if needed
steps.layoutTip: Head east until you hit the large wall at the east edge, then travel south to find the cavern entrance.

steps.hint: Arena exit usually south or east, rarely west
steps.layoutTip: Follow along the east edge of the zone to navigate efficiently.

steps.description: Activate the Beacon and burn the Black Flag
steps.hint: Complete the pillar puzzle to reach the beacon
steps.layoutTip: Head north and follow the north edge until you find the passage to the open beach area. Move north-east - if you find beach first, lighthouse is usually north.

steps.description: Talk to Weylam and sail to Brine King's Reef

steps.hint: Final boss of Act 6
steps.layoutTip: Follow the east edge through the reef to reach the boss arena.

steps.hint: Beginning of Act 7

acts.actName: The Master of a Million Faces

steps.hint: Follow the road upward
Follow the road to the waypoint

steps.description: Collect Silver Locket from nearby ruins
steps.hint: Located in the castle ruins near the waypoint
steps.layoutTip: The ruins entrance is close to the waypoint. Enter and collect the Silver Locket.

steps.description: Follow the road to The Crossroads

steps.hint: Follow the road - waypoint is centrally located

steps.description: Head south from waypoint to Fellshrine Ruins
steps.hint: North leads to Chamber of Sins, south to Fellshrine

steps.description: Follow the road to The Crypt
steps.hint: Stay on the main road through the ruins
Trial is mandatory for progression

steps.description: Find the Sarcophagus and collect Maligaro's Map
steps.hint: Look for the arena-marked sarcophagus
steps.layoutTip: Draw an imaginary line through the zone. Follow the opposite wall of the waypoint - if waypoint is below the line, follow the wall behind it. If above, follow the opposite wall.

steps.description: Turn in Silver Locket to Weylam
Head north from waypoint to Chamber of Sins Level 1
steps.hint: North of the waypoint leads to Chamber of Sins
Waypoint indicates the direction to Chamber of Sins Level 2

steps.description: Use Maligaro's Map in the Map Device
steps.hint: Map Device is in the central area

steps.description: Navigate to Maligaro's Workshop and kill Maligaro
steps.hint: Follow edges and bridges to reach the workshop
steps.layoutTip: Follow the outer edges and cross the bridges in sequence to reach Maligaro's Workshop at the far end.

steps.hint: Drops from Maligaro

steps.description: Return to Chamber of Sins Level 1 (Relog)
steps.hint: Relog for league start, portal for non-league start

steps.description: Return to town and turn in quests
steps.hint: Helena: Essence of the Artist, Weylam: Silver Locket

steps.description: Talk to Silk for Obsidian Key
steps.hint: Silk appears after returning from Maligaro's Sanctum

steps.description: Find and enter Chamber of Sins Level 2
steps.hint: Waypoint points toward the exit direction
steps.layoutTip: Find the entrance to the inner circular room, then head to the passage behind the waypoint.

steps.description: Unlock the Secret Passage with Obsidian Key
steps.hint: Secret passage leads to The Den

steps.layoutTip: Follow the direction the zone extends. At the first intersection, turn 90° right and continue in the new direction.

steps.hint: Build-dependent timing - another reminder later if skipped
steps.optionalNote: Early option - can be delayed to start of Act 8

steps.hint: Head toward the northwest section of the zone
steps.layoutTip: Follow the main road northwest to find the boss encounter area.
Continue on the road after the boss area.

steps.hint: Place portal at Dread Thicket entrance when found
steps.layoutTip: Move southwest to the west edge, then travel north along the west edge.

steps.description: Talk to Eramir for Passive Point
steps.quest: The Master of a Million Faces

steps.description: Talk to Helena for Essence of the Artist reward

steps.hint: Look for Dread Thicket entrance and place portal
steps.layoutTip: Continue north along the west edge. If you find the Dread Thicket entrance, place a portal and keep moving north.

steps.hint: Quest item found in the zone
steps.layoutTip: Move along the west edge to efficiently navigate the zone.

Move northwest. If you hit a wall, walk around it westward and continue northwest. If the wall extends more than one screen northwest, find an opening, move east, then head east/southeast to find the waypoint.

steps.hint: Use portal placed earlier if available
Fireflies are scattered throughout the zone

steps.description: Find Gruthkul's Den and kill Gruthkul
steps.hint: Arena-marked den in the zone

steps.description: Optional: Helena offers Amulet swap for Greust Necklace
steps.hint: Only if portal close to Azmeri Shrine
steps.optionalNote: Situational - trade rare amulet for Greust Necklace

steps.hint: Recommended timing if not done earlier
steps.optionalNote: Complete if skipped at Ashen Fields

steps.description: Navigate to Temple of Decay Level 2
steps.hint: Stairs are diagonally opposite - move in Z-pattern
steps.layoutTip: First floor: Follow the direction the zone extends. The stairs to Level 2 are at the diagonal opposite end from the entrance.

steps.hint: Search for recipe while navigating
Arena entrance diagonally opposite - use Z-pattern movement
steps.layoutTip: The stairs face the direction of the intact bridge. Move in that direction until you reach a corner, then turn and move in the direction the zone extends to cross the first bridge. Continue in Z-pattern to find the arena.

steps.hint: Final boss of Act 7
Beginning of Act 8

steps.layoutTip: Move east along the rampart wall until you reach a corner. Turn north and continue along the wall. Enter the broken wall section to climb atop the ramparts, then follow the wall until you find stairs descending.

steps.hint: Latest recommended timing for Lab 2
steps.optionalNote: Complete now if not done earlier

steps.hint: At the staircase, move west or east to reach town

steps.layoutTip: Go in the opposite direction the door opened. Alternatively, prioritize heading west first as two variants favor this approach.

steps.description: Enter The Cauldron and kill Doedre
steps.hint: Starting area forms a loop with one exit
steps.layoutTip: The starting area is a circular loop with a single exit. After exiting the loop, move south as much as possible to find The Cauldron. Sticking to the west edge provides more consistent pathing.

steps.description: Exit through Sewer Outlet to The Quay
steps.hint: Continue south after defeating Doedre
Follow the left edge along the waterside from the start
steps.layoutTip: Upon entering, immediately stick to the left edge (waterside) and follow it to locate the Ankh.

steps.description: Enter Resurrection Site and kill Tolman
steps.hint: Move northeast to find the arena entrance

steps.description: Find and enter The Grain Gate

steps.hint: Look for corpses near doorways marking important passages. Quest marker shows as a book icon
steps.layoutTip: The zone consists of multiple areas connected by indoor passages. Important passages are marked by corpses near doorways. If entering west of waypoint, first passage is north and both quest and exit are in zone 2. If entering south of waypoint, first passage is west, quest is in zone 3, exit in zone 2.

steps.hint: Look for indoor passages marked with nearby corpses
Navigate west from entrance, heading south
steps.layoutTip: Stick to the west edge and head south. When the curved tunnel leads to a T-junction, place your portal. If the curve appears west, Solaris Concourse is north and Bath House is south.

steps.hint: From T-junction, take the correct path based on layout

steps.layoutTip: Move east first to identify your layout. If you see a tall wall you can blink over, move north. If you see a house edge, backtrack and go north. If neither, head north to the ledge, follow to the river, then find the fountain and go behind it for the temple entrance.

steps.description: Take Portal back to The Underbelly

steps.hint: From T-junction portal, take the southern path
Portal before exploring further
Follow the southwest edge
Waypoint is northeast from Bath House entrance

steps.description: Take Portal back to The Bath House

steps.hint: Look for quest marker on minimap
Follow the southwest edge

steps.description: Enter Pools of Terror and kill Yugul
steps.hint: Follow the main path through the gardens

steps.description: Talk to Hargan for Passive Point
Talk to Maramoa for Passive Point
Talk to Clarissa for Passive Point

steps.layoutTip: If waypoint is in the west corner, move north behind it to find the exit. If waypoint is in the east corner, go north into a room that splits west - take that western path to Level 2.

steps.description: Kill Dawn and collect the Sun Orb
steps.layoutTip: If the room continues west or has a door west, follow the north edge west to the final room. Otherwise, it's an east variant - follow the north edge east until you can move north.

steps.hint: From waypoint, head northwest. Door icon appears on minimap
steps.layoutTip: The Lunaris Temple entrance is northwest of the waypoint. The exit faces either north or east - watch for the door icon on your minimap.

steps.hint: Follow the carpet path

steps.description: Kill Dusk and collect the Moon Orb
steps.hint: Consistent pattern: follow stairs up, single flower pot marks the fork
steps.layoutTip: Choose either clockwise or counterclockwise and maintain that pattern. Follow stairs going upward, and look for a single flower pot at forks to guide your path.

steps.description: Navigate northeast to The Harbour Bridge
Enter Sky Shrine and kill Lunaris & Solaris
steps.hint: Recommended Level 54+. Act 8 final boss
steps.layoutTip: Move northeast through the middle of the bridge to find the Sky Shrine entrance.

steps.hint: Beginning of Act 9. Farm to Level 58-62 here
Optional: Talk to Sin once. Side passages contain guaranteed Magic packs for extra experience.
steps.layoutTip: Move northeast along the aqueduct walkways. When your path ends, look for a bridge to cross to the parallel walkway. Repeat until you find the town entrance.
The first layer is always static. Exit is northeast of the entrance, along the western edge of the first layer.

steps.hint: Waypoint is always east of the entrance
Contains The Storm Blade quest item
steps.layoutTip: The chest spawns in one of four cardinal directions (North, East, South, or West) relative to the waypoint. Can appear before or after finding the waypoint.

steps.description: Kill Basilisk and collect Basilisk Acid
steps.hint: Head northeast toward the northern corner

steps.description: Talk to Petarus again to collect Bottled Storm

steps.hint: Usually along the eastern edge
steps.layoutTip: Stick to the east edge. If you spawn in the north corner, move south. Otherwise, move north.

steps.hint: Portal places you next to the waypoint
Found at the first tunnel split (East/West)
Located in a side corridor

steps.description: Follow main path northeast to The Quarry
steps.hint: Exit is northeast from the entrance

steps.description: Search west and north for The Refinery
steps.hint: Search the western and northern sections

steps.description: Kill Adus and collect Trarthan Powder
steps.hint: Follow the cart tracks to the boss arena
steps.layoutTip: Follow the minecart tracks through the zone. The boss arena is in the north corner along the east edge. Crafting bench (if league start) is where tracks end at a grate.

steps.hint: Found where the cart tracks end at a grate

steps.description: Search south and north to enter The Belly of the Beast
Clear 3 sub-areas and find The Black Heart entrance
steps.hint: Follow the zone passages. Second tunnel in main room leads forward.
steps.layoutTip: Enter the second tunnel in the main room to progress. Follow the linear path through the nightmare sequences.

steps.hint: Act 9 final boss. Recommended Level 60+

steps.description: Talk to Lilly Roth to sail to Oriath Docks
steps.hint: Can portal to town during kill animation to skip loot. Waypoint from town places you near Act 10 rooftop entrance.

steps.description: Talk to Irasha for 2 Passive Points
steps.hint: Return to town before sailing to Act 10 to claim reward
Bannon is North of the entrance
steps.layoutTip: Always head South-East. Rescue Bannon North of the entrance, then the exit is in the South-East corner.

steps.description: Enter Cathedral Apex and kill Plaguewing

steps.hint: Static layout - Blood Fountain is South-East of entrance. North bridge is broken.
North-East from Blood Fountain. Can dash over broken bridge with movement skills, or go South-East then North
South of Waypoint, follow snake pattern
Semi-static layout. Move clockwise around the zone

steps.description: Kill Avarius and collect Staff of Avarius
steps.layoutTip: Head West along North edge until first elevated layer curves South. If there's a passage below it, it leads to boss. Otherwise, continue West to next South passage.

steps.hint: In side corridor, about halfway through the zone
South-West from Blood Fountain. Look for openings in house walls twice
steps.layoutTip: From Blood Fountain, move South-West until you find an opening in the wall made of houses. Go through and repeat once more to find the entrance.

steps.hint: Boss arena in North-West corner. Move along North edge heading West.

steps.description: Talk to Lani for quest reward
Talk to Innocence to unlock The Canals

steps.optionalNote: [LEAGUE START] League-start recommended - complete trial and Merciless Lab before Kitava

steps.hint: Follow one edge until you find the trial
Recommended before fighting Kitava
Move North whenever possible
On West walkway, near Sin

steps.layoutTip: Static layout. Two walkways beside a blood-filled canal. Boss arena is always in the North corner. West walkway is recommended (contains crafting recipe).

steps.description: Enter Altar of Hunger and kill Kitava
steps.hint: Walk straight North-East on West walkway

steps.description: Talk to Sin after defeating Kitava
Talk to Lilly Roth and sail to Karui Shores

steps.hint: Movement Speed craft
Type '/passives' in chat to check for missing skill points
The act tracker can now be disabled in settings. Check for missing passive points with '/passives' command.
